definitions.title: vb. be sated, gorged
definitions.body: with food (cf. Ar. ka4iy’a be filled with food; As. kissatum, sustenance, provender, food, Zephnpf:BAS i. 503);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[שָׁמַנְתָּ עָבִיתָ כָּשִׂיתָ]] De 32:15 thou grewest fat, becamest thick, wast gorged ! fig. of Isr. as fat beast (cf. Dr).
